5 is odd
12 is even
1/1 = 1.00
1/2 = 0.50
1/3 = 0.33
1/4 = 0.25
1/5 = 0.20
1/6 = 0.17
1/7 = 0.14
1/8 = 0.12
1/9 = 0.11
1/10 = 0.10
reverse of 1234567890 is 987654321
Max from 10, 20, 30 is 30
